title: When You Fight the Tiger
description: Text and photographs introduce the work done at a California ranch, Gentle Jungle, in raising and training wild animals for movie and television work, focusing on sixteen-year-old Tana Helfer, daughter of the owners, who has worked with the animals all her life.A dramatic, behind-the-scenes look at Gentle Jungle, a ranch in California where wild animals are raised and trained for movie and television work
author: Joan Hewett
